alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 3:29PM MDT until June 17 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN COUNTY... At 328 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles east of Karval, or 41 miles south of Limon, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. A 60 mph wind gust was reported by a weather spotter 10 miles south of Forder as this storm moved through. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Lincoln County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
